headline: High Ground Invests Further in Arch Capital Group Ltd. (ACGL)
summary: Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) is among the best low-risk stocks to buy now. During the second quarter, High Ground Investment Management LLP expanded its holdings in the shares of Arch Capital Group Ltd. (NASDAQ:ACGL) by 24.9%, according to the disclosure with the SEC.
